verses.text: And Jacob called unto his sons, and said, Gather yourselves together, that I may tell you \add that\add* which shall befall you in the last days.
Gather yourselves together, and hear, ye sons of Jacob; And hearken unto Israel your father.
Reuben, thou \add art\add* my firstborn, My might, and the beginning of my strength, The excellency of dignity, and the excellency of power:
Unstable as water, thou shalt not excel; Because thou wentest up to thy father’s bed; Then defiledst thou \add it:\add* he went up to my couch.
Simeon and Levi \add are\add* brethren; Instruments of cruelty \add are in\add* their habitations.
O my soul, come not thou into their secret; Unto their assembly, mine honour, be not thou united: For in their anger they slew a man, And in their selfwill they digged down a wall.
Cursed \add be\add* their anger, for \add it was\add* fierce; And their wrath, for it was cruel: I will divide them in Jacob, And scatter them in Israel.
Judah, thou \add art he\add* whom thy brethren shall praise: Thy hand \add shall be\add* in the neck of thine enemies; Thy father’s children shall bow down before thee.
Judah \add is\add* a lion’s whelp: From the prey, my son, thou art gone up: He stooped down, he couched as a lion, And as an old lion; who shall rouse him up?
The sceptre shall not depart from Judah, Nor a lawgiver from between his feet, Until Shiloh come; And unto him \add shall\add* the gathering of the people \add be\add*.
Binding his foal unto the vine, And his ass’s colt unto the choice vine; He washed his garments in wine, And his clothes in the blood of grapes:
\add His\add* eyes \add shall be\add* red with wine, And \add his\add* teeth white with milk.
Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea; And he \add shall be\add* for a haven of ships; And his border \add shall be\add* unto Zidon.
Issachar \add is\add* a strong ass Couching down between two burdens:
And he saw that rest \add was\add* good, And the land that \add it was\add* pleasant; And bowed his shoulder to bear, And became a servant unto tribute.
Dan shall judge his people, As one of the tribes of Israel.
Dan shall be a serpent by the way, An adder in the path, That biteth the horse heels, So that his rider shall fall backward.
I have waited for thy salvation, O \sc Lord\sc*.
Gad, a troop shall overcome him: But he shall overcome at the last.
Out of Asher his bread \add shall be\add* fat, And he shall yield royal dainties.
Naphtali \add is\add* a hind let loose: He giveth goodly words.
Joseph \add is\add* a fruitful bough, \add Even\add* a fruitful bough by a well; \add Whose\add* branches run over the wall.
The archers have sorely grieved him, And shot \add at him\add*, and hated him:
But his bow abode in strength, And the arms of his hands were made strong By the hands of the mighty \add God\add* of Jacob; (From thence \add is\add* the shepherd, the stone of Israel:)

\add Even\add* by the God of thy father, who shall help thee; And \add by\add* the Almighty, who shall bless thee \add With\add* blessings of heaven above, Blessings of the deep that lieth under, Blessings of the breasts, and of the womb:

The blessings of thy father have prevailed above the blessings of my progenitors Unto the utmost bound of the everlasting hills: They shall be on the head of Joseph, And on the crown of the head of him \add that was\add* separate from his brethren.
Benjamin shall ravin \add as\add* a wolf: In the morning he shall devour the prey, And at night he shall divide the spoil.
All these \add are\add* the twelve tribes of Israel: and this \add is it\add* that their father spake unto them, and blessed them; every one according to his blessing he blessed them.
And he charged them, and said unto them, I \add am to be\add* gathered unto my people: bury me with my fathers in the cave that \add is\add* in the field of Ephron the Hittite,

in the cave that \add is\add* in the field of Machpelah, which \add is\add* before Mamre, in the land of Canaan, which Abraham bought with the field of Ephron the Hittite for a possession of a buryingplace.
There they buried Abraham and Sarah his wife; there they buried Isaac and Rebekah his wife; and there I buried Leah.
The purchase of the field and of the cave that \add is\add* therein \add was\add* from the children of Heth.
And when Jacob had made an end of commanding his sons, he gathered up his feet into the bed, and yielded up the ghost, and was gathered unto his people.
